Articles.Content:
I've been obsessing over KSP long enough that I've decided to join the forums. I suppose I should start with the game- I love it, and I've successfully landed on the MÃƒÂ¼n and returned, along with creating a space station. I've also just recently started perfecting my ability to dock.

Along with KSP, I'm also a lover of mathematics and I've done talks at Simpson College... Aaaand, that's all I can really think of.

Oh, and, after making stuff in KSP that actually works, I'm also trying to make things that look cool. I find that significantly more difficult because I have no idea what looks cool. So, that's about it, now I'm on the forums.

Welcome to the community Imaginer1

Maybe you can work KSP into one of your talks? Think of how cool you'd be when the students see you also play KSP

As for making cool craft, I'm sure the guys here can give you some pointers

Have fun docking and fly safe!
